column1: The QRC Airborne ISR Systems Division of the Airborne Solutions Group of Leidos currently has an opening for a Physical Configuration Database Administrator supporting the PSS-T program. The Physical Configuration Database Administrator for the PSS-T Program is responsible for building and managing configuration trees for 23 active PSS-T systems in the customer provided database. Work with sites to update physical configuration documentation and database entries for each ECP or capabilities swap.
Monitor site compliance and accurate physical configuration records.
Develop all physical configuration reports and provide to the configuration management team for their monthly deliverables.
